affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 性质, 状况

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，多用复数，可与appearance换用，但较口语化。
书面用词，突出人或事物在某特定时间或地点时的外貌。
普通用词，着重由总体产生的印象。

word_group.brief_definition: 外观上；在外表上；表面上
公开露面；公开出庭；公开亮相
个人外表；个人相貌；个人仪表
美观大方；雅观大方；优雅的代表
一般外观；一般外表；总体外观
焊缝外观；焊缝形貌；焊缝表面
电视剧角色；电视上亮相；节目
外表不吸引人；外观不抢眼；外表平庸

bilingual.source: The appearance of this phone is very fashion.
bilingual.target: 这款手机的外观非常新潮。

bilingual.source: Good lighting enhances the appearance of a room.
bilingual.target: 良好的照明提高房间的外观。

bilingual.source: Kirby is known for his pink, round appearance.
bilingual.target: 卡比以其粉红色的圆形外观而闻名。

bilingual.source: The toco is known for its striking appearance.
bilingual.target: 巨嘴鸟以其引人注目的外观而闻名。

bilingual.source: Good lighting can enhance the appearance of a room.
bilingual.target: 良好的照明可以提高房间的外观。

bilingual.source: The scratches on the car are marring its appearance.
bilingual.target: 汽车上的划痕正在损坏它的外观。

bilingual.source: The baby's cyanotic appearance alarmed the doctors.
bilingual.target: 婴儿发绀的外观让医生们感到震惊。

bilingual.source: Glads are known for their tall and elegant appearance.
bilingual.target: 剑兰以其高大优雅的外观而闻名。

bilingual.source: The outward appearance of the building is very modern.
bilingual.target: 这栋建筑的向外的外观非常现代。

list.abstract: appearance（英 [əˈpɪərəns]，美 [əˈpɪrəns]），英语单词，作名词为面貌；外表；外观。例句：Attempting to meet society's expectation of appearance.（努力满足社会对外表的期待。） appearance的近义词有occurrence，aspect，emergence等。

yingyinNormal.en: You know the nature of your mutation. If any genes hold the key to changing appearance, it's yours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道你变异的性质。若有任何基因能决定外观，那就是你的。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, I should at least make an appearance at Billy's.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我至少得去比利家露个脸。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't decide whether I want Stan Lee to autograph my Journey into Mystery 83, first appearance of Thor or my Fantastic Four number five, first appearance of Dr. Doom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我实在无法取舍究竟让斯坦·李把名字签在托尔第一次出场的《神秘之旅》83期上，还是签在《神奇四侠》第五本上，死亡博士的处女秀。

yingyinNormal.en: After an appearance in a small cafe in New York City, he made some bad choices.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在纽约的那家小小的咖啡馆露过一次面后，他做了一些错事。

yingyinNormal.en: Because it makes me feel alive, as opposed to giving me the appearance of normality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只有这样才能让我感到有动力，而不是让我看起来只是一个普通人。

yingyinNormal.en: Al-Qaeda? The IRA have been getting restless again, maybe they're going to make an appearance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 基地组织? 爱尔兰共和军又开始活动了，也许他们会来。

yingyinNormal.en: My outward appearance now seems to represent the current trends agreeable to the general populace.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的外在面貌似乎具象化了当前普通群众审美潮流啊。

yingyinNormal.en: People are overlooked for a variety of biased reasons and perceived flaws. Age, appearance, personality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 球员通常会由于各种偏见和臆断而被埋没，比如年龄，外貌，性格。

yingyinNormal.en: Hank. This serum that you're making it doesn't affect abilities right? Just appearance. It normalizes it. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 汉克，你在做的那种血清，不会影响能力吧？只是让外表正常。对。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, we need to stay focused on our contingency plan for an evacuation without the appearance of doing so.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，我们继续集中力量制定一份紧急疏散计划但不要让外界察觉我们的行动。

yingyinNormal.en: All I want is the appearance. Let's look at best and worst case scenarios as soon as possible. Thank you very much.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只想装装样子。尽快估计一下最好和最坏的结果。多谢了。

yingyinNormal.en: When he dismissed her again, the old woman's out with her appearance melted away, to reveal a beautiful enchantress.
yingyinNormal.zh: 王子依然要驱赶她，这时候老妇人的丑陋顷刻消散，变成了一个非常美丽的女巫。

yingyinNormal.en: As a gift, she offered the Prince a single rose. Repulsed by her haggard appearance, the Prince turned the woman away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 作为答谢，她送给王子一支玫瑰。王子十分嫌弃形容枯槁的老婆婆，王子要赶走老婆婆。

yingyinNormal.en: He wasn't interested in the appearance of intellect or wit. He wanted the real thing. He wanted to create consciousness.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他对智慧或才智的表现并不感兴趣，他想要真实的东西，他想创造意识。

yingyinNormal.en: Smackle, did you assume this outward change in your appearance would not affect your inner self? Of course it won't. I am Smackle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 史麦科，你是否同意你在外表上的改观会影响你内心的生活观念？怎么可能呢，我是史麦。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 不见；消失；不复存在；失踪；被杀害；丢失；被盗；不再使用
v. 消失；看不见；不再存在；不再使用；丢失；无法找到；失踪；被杀害
n. 面貌；外表；外观；参演；参与；露面；到来；出现；产生；问世

word_family.mean: v. 进入视野；出现；显现；看上去；留下…的印象；产生；体现；问世；开始被使用；出版

sense_info_list.en: the way that someone or something looks

examination_example.sentence: Though it may celebrate girlhood in one way, it also repeatedly and firmly fuses girls' identity to <highlight>appearance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然它（粉色）可能以一种方式庆祝少女时代，但它也反复而坚定地将女孩的身份与外表融合在一起。

sense_info_list.en: an act of becoming visible or noticeable
an impression given by someone or something, although this may be misleading

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 性质, 状况

word_usage.usage:
appearance作名词，表示“到来；出现”时，常用单数形式，如：the sudden appearance of a security guard 保安突然出现；
表示“种种迹象”时，常用复数形式，如：To all appearances he was dead. 从种种迹象来看，他已经死了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 不见；消失；不复存在；失踪；被杀害；丢失；被盗；不再使用
v. 消失；看不见；不再存在；不再使用；丢失；无法找到；失踪；被杀害
n. 面貌；外表；外观；参演；参与；露面；到来；出现；产生；问世

word_family.mean: v. 进入视野；出现；显现；看上去；留下…的印象；产生；体现；问世；开始被使用；出版

sense_info_list.en: the way that someone or something looks

examination_example.sentence: In conversation, people have to carefully consider their status and <highlight>appearance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在交谈中，人们必须仔细考虑他们的地位和外表。

examination_example.sentence: It's telling that, while Google began life as a PhD thesis, Facebook started as a tool to judge classmates' <highlight>appearances</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很明显，当谷歌以一篇博士论文的形式诞生时，脸书却是作为一个评判同学外貌的工具而诞生的。

examination_example.sentence: A robot's <highlight>appearance</highlight> affects its ability to successfully interact with humans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 机器人的外观会影响其与人类成功互动的能力。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 性质, 状况

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词, 着重由总体产生的印象。
书面用词, 突出人或事物在某特定时间或地点时的外貌。
普通用词, 多用复数, 可与 appearance 换用, 但较口语化。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 不见；消失；不复存在；失踪；被杀害；丢失；被盗；不再使用
v. 消失；看不见；不再存在；不再使用；丢失；无法找到；失踪；被杀害
n. 面貌；外表；外观；参演；参与；露面；到来；出现；产生；问世

word_family.mean: v. 进入视野；出现；显现；看上去；留下…的印象；产生；体现；问世；开始被使用；出版

sense_info_list.en: the way that someone or something looks

examination_example.sentence: Others simply dislike the <highlight>appearance</highlight> of forests planted in neat rows.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他人只是不喜欢整齐排列的森林。

examination_example.sentence: The main argument against graffiti is that it spoils the <highlight>appearance</highlight> of both types of property: public and private.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 反对涂鸦的主要论点是，它破坏了公共和私人两种财产的外观。

examination_example.sentence: He became one of the first modern chefs to focus on the <highlight>appearance</highlight> of his table, not just the flavor of his dishes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他成为首批专注于外观而不只是菜肴风味的现代厨师之一。

sense_info_list.en: an act of becoming visible or noticeable

examination_example.sentence: Another typical example is that with the <highlight>appearance</highlight> of various social video Apps people can't resist the temptation of them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一个典型的例子是，随着各种社交视频应用软件的出现，人们无法抗拒它们的诱惑。

examination_example.sentence: Worse, when Asian Americans do make an <highlight>appearance</highlight> in lesson books, it is often laced with problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更糟糕的是，当亚裔美国人真的出现在教科书中时，往往会伴随着问题。

examination_example.sentence: "Cats use a causal-logical understanding of noise or sounds to predict the <highlight>appearance</highlight> of invisible objects," lead researcher Saho Takagi says in a press release.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首席研究员 Saho Takagi 在一份新闻稿中说：“猫利用对噪音或声音的因果逻辑理解来预测看不见的物体的出现。”

sense_info_list.en: an impression given by someone or something; although this may be misleading

examination_example.sentence: The white clothing conveyed an image of cleanliness, according to Careme-and in his realm, <highlight>appearance</highlight> was everything.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据 Careme 的说法，白色衣服传达出干净的形象——在他的领域中，外表就是一切。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，着重由总体产生的印象。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 不见；消失；不复存在；失踪；被杀害；丢失；被盗；不再使用
v. 消失；看不见；不再存在；不再使用；丢失；无法找到；失踪；被杀害
n. 面貌；外表；外观；参演；参与；露面；到来；出现；产生；问世

word_family.mean: v. 进入视野；出现；显现；看上去；留下…的印象；产生；体现；问世；开始被使用；出版

sense_info_list.en: an act of becoming visible or noticeable

examination_example.sentence: He moved forward, gaining a scholarship to the Neighborhood Playhouse and making his first television <highlight>appearance</highlight> in 1948.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他继续前进，获得了邻里剧院的奖学金，并在1948年首次在电视上露面。

examination_example.sentence: And the more we look, the more we will see that social factors do not determine the <highlight>appearance</highlight> of genius.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们看得越多，就越会发现社会因素并不能决定天才的出现。

examination_example.sentence: To make sure the <highlight>appearance</highlight> of driverless vehicles doesn't extend the worst aspects of the car-controlled transportation system we have today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 确保无人驾驶汽车的出现不会扩大我们今天拥有的汽车控制交通系统的最坏方面。

sense_info_list.en: the way that someone or something looks

examination_example.sentence: Dirty shorts and old shoes gave him the <highlight>appearance</highlight> of a real beggar.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 脏短裤和旧鞋子使他看上去就像一个真正的乞丐。

examination_example.sentence: Beautifully restored to its 1860 <highlight>appearance</highlight>, the house was Abraham and Mary Lincoln's home for 17 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这座房子被漂亮地修复成1860年的样子，它17年来一直是亚伯拉罕和玛丽·林肯的家。

sense_info_list.en: [count  noun]an impression given by someone or something, although this may be misleading

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 性质, 状况

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，着重由总体产生的印象。
书面用词，突出人或事物在某特定时间或地点时的外貌。
普通用词，多用复数，可与 appearance 换用，但较口语化。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 不见；消失；不复存在；失踪；被杀害；丢失；被盗；不再使用
v. 消失；看不见；不再存在；不再使用；丢失；无法找到；失踪；被杀害
n. 面貌；外表；外观；参演；参与；露面；到来；出现；产生；问世

word_family.mean: v. 进入视野；出现；显现；看上去；留下…的印象；产生；体现；问世；开始被使用；出版

sense_info_list.en: the way that someone or something looks

examination_example.sentence: And each has a different <highlight>appearance</highlight> (形态), walking or standing, holding their heads high or low.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个都有不同的形态，走路或站着，抬头或低头。

examination_example.sentence: Hyun realized <highlight>appearance</highlight> didn't always tell the truth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他意识到外表并不总是说明事实。

examination_example.sentence: As a police artist, Joe Brown draws pictures of suspects (嫌疑犯) when people tell him about the <highlight>appearance</highlight> of each suspect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为一名警方画像专家，当人们告诉乔·布朗每个嫌疑犯的外貌时，他就会画出嫌疑犯的画像。

sense_info_list.en: an act of becoming visible or noticeable

examination_example.sentence: The Ming and Qing dynasties saw the <highlight>appearance</highlight> of the Four Famous Ink Stones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 明清两代出现了“四大名砚”。

examination_example.sentence: With the <highlight>appearance</highlight> of electric cars, people wonder whether electric cars can achieve the same standards as gasoline cars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着电动汽车的出现，人们怀疑电动汽车能否达到与汽油汽车相同的标准。

examination_example.sentence: Different from 3G and 4G technologies, 5G technology will influence various industries and encourage the <highlight>appearance</highlight> of many new products, services and industries．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与3G和4G技术不同，5G技术会影响各个行业，并促进许多新产品、新服务和新行业的出现。

sense_info_list.en: [count  noun]an impression given by someone or something, although this may be misleading

examination_example.sentence: It tells us not to be fooled by <highlight>appearances</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它告诉我们不要被外表所欺骗。
